verses.verse: תְּפִלָּ֖ה <WH8605> A prayer לַחֲבַקּ֣וּק <WH2265> of Habakkuk הַנָּבִ֑יא <WH5030> the prophet עַ֖ל <WH5921> according שִׁגְיֹנֽוֹת׃ <WH7692> upon Shigionoth

יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> O LORD שָׁמַ֣עְתִּי <WH8085> I have heard שִׁמְעֲךָ֮ <WH8088> thy speech יָרֵאתִי֒ <WH3372> [and] was afraid יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> O LORD פָּֽעָלְךָ֙ <WH6467> thy work בְּקֶ֤רֶב <WH7130> in the midst שָׁנִים֙ <WH8141> of the years חַיֵּ֔יהוּ <WH2421> revive בְּקֶ֥רֶב <WH7130> in the midst שָׁנִ֖ים <WH8141> of the years תּוֹדִ֑יעַ <WH3045> make known בְּרֹ֖גֶז <WH7267> in wrath רַחֵ֥ם <WH7355> mercy תִּזְכּֽוֹר׃ <WH2142> remember

אֱל֙וֹהַ֙ <WH433> God מִתֵּימָ֣ן <WH8487> from Teman יָב֔וֹא <WH935> came וְקָד֥וֹשׁ <WH6918> and the Holy One מֵֽהַר־ <WH2022> from mount פָּארָ֖ן <WH6290> Paran סֶ֑לָה <WH5542> Selah כִּסָּ֤ה <WH3680> covered שָׁמַ֙יִם֙ <WH8064> the heavens הוֹד֔וֹ <WH1935> His glory וּתְהִלָּת֖וֹ <WH8416> of his praise מָלְאָ֥ה <WH4390> was full הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> and the earth

וְנֹ֙גַהּ֙ <WH5051> And [his] brightness כָּא֣וֹר <WH216> was as the light תִּֽהְיֶ֔ה <WH1961> become קַרְנַ֥יִם <WH7161> he had horns מִיָּד֖וֹ <WH3027> [coming] out of his hand ל֑וֹ וְשָׁ֖ם <WH8033> and there חֶבְי֥וֹן <WH2253> and there [was] the hiding עֻזֹּֽה׃ <WH5797> of his power
לְפָנָ֖יו <WH6440> Before יֵ֣לֶךְ <WH1980> goes דָּ֑בֶר <WH1698> the pestilence וְיֵצֵ֥א <WH3318> went forth רֶ֖שֶׁף <WH7565> and burning coals לְרַגְלָֽיו׃ <WH7272> at his feet

עָמַ֣ד ׀ <WH5975> He stood וַיְמֹ֣דֶד <WH4058> and surveyed אֶ֗רֶץ <WH776> the earth רָאָה֙ <WH7200> he beheld וַיַּתֵּ֣ר <WH5425> and drove asunder גּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> the nations וַיִּתְפֹּֽצְצוּ֙ <WH6327> were scattered הַרְרֵי־ <WH2042> mountains עַ֔ד <WH5703> and the everlasting שַׁח֖וּ <WH7817> did bow גִּבְע֣וֹת <WH1389> hills עוֹלָ֑ם <WH5769> the perpetual הֲלִיכ֥וֹת <WH1979> his ways עוֹלָ֖ם <WH5769> [are] everlasting לֽוֹ׃

תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> under אָ֔וֶן <WH205> in affliction רָאִ֖יתִי <WH7200> I saw אָהֳלֵ֣י <WH168> the tents כוּשָׁ֑ן <WH3572> of Cushan יִרְגְּז֕וּן <WH7264> did tremble יְרִיע֖וֹת <WH3407> [and] the curtains אֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> of the land מִדְיָֽן׃ <WH4080> of Midian ס

הֲבִנְהָרִים֙ <WH5104> the rivers חָרָ֣ה <WH2734> displeased יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Was the LORD אִ֤ם <WH518> Or בַּנְּהָרִים֙ <WH5104> the rivers אַפֶּ֔ךָ <WH639> your anger אִם־ <WH518> Or בַּיָּ֖ם <WH3220> against the sea עֶבְרָתֶ֑ךָ <WH5678> your wrath כִּ֤י <WH3588> that תִרְכַּב֙ <WH7392> that thou didst ride עַל־ <WH5921> on סוּסֶ֔יךָ <WH5483> upon thine horses מַרְכְּבֹתֶ֖יךָ <WH4818> [and] thy chariots יְשׁוּעָֽה׃ <WH3444> deliverance

עֶרְיָ֤ה <WH6181> was made quite תֵעוֹר֙ <WH5783> naked קַשְׁתֶּ֔ךָ <WH7198> Thy bow שְׁבֻע֥וֹת <WH7621> [according] to the oaths מַטּ֖וֹת <WH4294> of the tribes אֹ֣מֶר <WH562> [even thy] word סֶ֑לָה <WH5542> Selah נְהָר֖וֹת <WH5104> with rivers תְּבַקַּע־ <WH1234> Thou didst cleave אָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> the earth

רָא֤וּךָ <WH7200> saw יָחִ֙ילוּ֙ <WH2342> thee [and] they trembled הָרִ֔ים <WH2022> The mountains זֶ֥רֶם <WH2230> the overflowing מַ֖יִם <WH4325> of the water עָבָ֑ר <WH5674> passed by נָתַ֤ן <WH5414> uttered תְּהוֹם֙ <WH8415> the deep קוֹל֔וֹ <WH6963> his voice ר֖וֹם <WH7315> on high יָדֵ֥יהוּ <WH3027> his hands נָשָֽׂא׃ <WH5375> [and] lifted up

שֶׁ֥מֶשׁ <WH8121> The sun יָרֵ֖חַ <WH3394> [and] moon עָ֣מַד <WH5975> stood still זְבֻ֑לָה <WH2073> in their habitation לְא֤וֹר <WH216> at the light חִצֶּ֙יךָ֙ <WH2671> of thine arrows יְהַלֵּ֔כוּ <WH1980> they went לְנֹ֖גַהּ <WH5051> [and] at the shining בְּרַ֥ק <WH1300> of thy glittering חֲנִיתֶֽךָ׃ <WH2595> spear
בְּזַ֖עַם <WH2195> in indignation תִּצְעַד־ <WH6805> Thou didst march through אָ֑רֶץ <WH776> the land בְּאַ֖ף <WH639> in anger תָּד֥וּשׁ <WH1758> thou didst thresh גּוֹיִֽם׃ <WH1471> the heathen

יָצָ֙אתָ֙ <WH3318> Thou wentest forth לְיֵ֣שַׁע <WH3468> for the salvation עַמֶּ֔ךָ <WH5971> of thy people לְיֵ֖שַׁע <WH3468> [even] for salvation אֶת־ <WH853> מְשִׁיחֶ֑ךָ <WH4899> with thine anointed מָחַ֤צְתָּ <WH4272> thou woundedst רֹּאשׁ֙ <WH7218> the head מִבֵּ֣ית <WH1004> out of the house רָשָׁ֔ע <WH7563> of the wicked עָר֛וֹת <WH6168> by discovering יְס֥וֹד <WH3247> the foundation עַד־ <WH5704> against צַוָּ֖אר <WH6677> unto the neck סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Selah פ

נָקַ֤בְתָּ <WH5344> Thou didst strike through בְמַטָּיו֙ <WH4294> with his staves רֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> the head [פְּרָזֹו כ] (פְּרָזָ֔יו <WH6518> village ק) יִסְעֲר֖וּ <WH5590> they came out as a whirlwind לַהֲפִיצֵ֑נִי <WH6327> to scatter עֲלִ֣יצֻתָ֔ם <WH5951> me their rejoicing כְּמוֹ־ <WH3644> like לֶאֱכֹ֥ל <WH398> [was] as to devour עָנִ֖י <WH6041> the poor בַּמִּסְתָּֽר׃ <WH4565> secretly
דָּרַ֥כְתָּ <WH1869> Thou didst walk בַיָּ֖ם <WH3220> through the sea סוּסֶ֑יךָ <WH5483> with thine horses חֹ֖מֶר <WH2563> [through] the heap מַ֥יִם <WH4325> waters רַבִּֽים׃ <WH7227> of great

שָׁמַ֣עְתִּי ׀ <WH8085> When I heard וַתִּרְגַּ֣ז <WH7264> trembled בִּטְנִ֗י <WH990> my belly לְקוֹל֙ <WH6963> at the voice צָלֲל֣וּ <WH6750> quivered שְׂפָתַ֔י <WH8193> my lips יָב֥וֹא <WH935> entered רָקָ֛ב <WH7538> rottenness בַּעֲצָמַ֖י <WH6106> into my bones וְתַחְתַּ֣י <WH8478> my place אֶרְגָּ֑ז <WH7264> and I trembled אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> Because אָנ֙וּחַ֙ <WH5117> in myself that I might rest לְי֣וֹם <WH3117> in the day צָרָ֔ה <WH6869> of trouble לַעֲל֖וֹת <WH5927> when he cometh up לְעַ֥ם <WH5971> unto the people יְגוּדֶֽנּוּ׃ <WH1464> he will invade them with his troops

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Though תְאֵנָ֣ה <WH8384> Although the fig tree לֹֽא־ <WH3808> no תִפְרָ֗ח <WH6524> shall not blossom וְאֵ֤ין <WH369> and there יְבוּל֙ <WH2981> neither [shall] fruit בַּגְּפָנִ֔ים <WH1612> [be] in the vines כִּחֵשׁ֙ <WH3584> shall fail מַעֲשֵׂה־ <WH4639> the labour זַ֔יִת <WH2132> of the olive וּשְׁדֵמ֖וֹת <WH7709> and the fields לֹא־ <WH3808> no עָ֣שָׂה <WH6213> shall yield אֹ֑כֶל <WH400> no meat גָּזַ֤ר <WH1504> shall be cut off מִמִּכְלָה֙ <WH4356> from the fold צֹ֔אן <WH6629> the flock וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> be no בָּקָ֖ר <WH1241> and [there shall be] no herd בָּרְפָתִֽים׃ <WH7517> in the stalls
וַאֲנִ֖י <WH589> in בַּיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> in the LORD אֶעְל֑וֹזָה <WH5937> Yet I will rejoice אָגִ֖ילָה <WH1523> I will joy בֵּאלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> in the God יִשְׁעִֽי׃ <WH3468> of my salvation

יְהוִ֤ה <WH3069> The LORD אֲדֹנָי֙ <WH136> God חֵילִ֔י <WH2428> [is] my strength וַיָּ֤שֶׂם <WH7760> and he will make רַגְלַי֙ <WH7272> my feet כָּֽאַיָּל֔וֹת <WH355> like hinds' וְעַ֥ל <WH5921> on בָּמוֹתַ֖י <WH1116> upon mine high places יַדְרִכֵ֑נִי <WH1869> [feet] and he will make me to walk לַמְנַצֵּ֖חַ <WH5329> To the chief singer בִּנְגִינוֹתָֽי׃ <WH5058> on my stringed instruments
